remarks: Span of a scalar product of a singleton.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2014.)
statement:
lspsn.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lspsn.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lspsn.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsn.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lspsn.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsnvsi $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { ( R .x. X ) } ) C_ ( N ` { X } ) ) $.
